entry.title: Holodomor Memorial Day
entry.content: ... that the Ukrainian Holodomor Memorial Day (commemoration pictured), commemorating the victims of the 1932–33 famine, is also observed in Canada?

entry.title: MLS Cup 2021
entry.content: ... that today's MLS Cup 2021 will mark the seventh consecutive final to feature either the Portland Timbers or Seattle Sounders FC?

entry.title: Aldo Forbice
entry.content: ... that Italian radio presenter Aldo Forbice was a long-time supporter of local social issues, including helping to promote an exhibition on the AIDS epidemic?

entry.title: Chain Island
entry.content: ... that when the U.S. government wanted to remove Chain Island, a group of "California capitalists" offered to do it for free, recouping expenses by mining it for gold?

entry.title: Irish
entry.content: ... that backgammon was derived from the esteemed 16th-century Scottish and English tables game of Irish and eventually surpassed it in popularity?

entry.title: W. Sterling Cary
entry.content: ... that during W. Sterling Cary's presidency of the National Council of Churches in the 1970s, the council voted to support gay rights for the first time in its history?

entry.title: Iplikçi Mosque
entry.content: ... that the 13th-century Iplikçi Mosque in Konya, Turkey, contains a mihrab with traces of mosaic tiling which is the oldest extant example of Anatolian Seljuk art?

entry.title: did not want the U.S. Congress to make him buy broccoli
entry.content: ... that Justice Antonin Scalia stated that he did not want the U.S. Congress to make him buy broccoli?
